panels.description: If ingestion falls to zero there is an issue with the graph nodes processing new blocks. Check health of blockchain nodes
panels.title: Block ingestion rate

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  name,
  head_block_number AS "block_number",
  head_block_hash AS "block_hash"
FROM ethereum_networks
ORDER BY name;

SELECT
  subgraph.name || 
    CASE 
      WHEN subgraph.pending_version = version.id THEN ' (P)'
      WHEN subgraph.current_version = version.id THEN ' (C)'
      ELSE ' (Unknown)' 
    END AS subgraph_name,
  deployment.deployment,
  schema.id as schema_id,
  schema.created_at as created,
  shard as shard,
  active as active,
  REPLACE(assignment.node_id, '', '') AS node_id,
  deployment.synced::text AS is_synced,
  network.name AS network_name,
  (network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) AS blocks_behind_network,
  CASE 
    WHEN network.name = 'mainnet' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 5)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'rinkeby' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 4)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'kovan' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 15)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'poa-core' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'ropsten' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 2)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'arbitrum-one' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 230)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'arbitrum-sepolia' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 230)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'matic' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'base' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'optimism' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'avalanche' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'fantom' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 40)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'celo' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'gnosis' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'bsc' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 20)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'linea' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'scroll' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 20)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'boba' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'boba-bnb' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 5)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'moonbeam' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 10)::text
    ELSE 'N/A' 
  END AS lag
FROM
  subgraphs.subgraph_deployment AS deployment,
  subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment AS assignment,
  subgraphs.subgraph_version AS version,
  subgraphs.subgraph AS subgraph,
  ethereum_networks AS network,
  deployment_schemas AS schema
WHERE
  subgraph.id = version.subgraph
  AND version.id IN (subgraph.pending_version, subgraph.current_version)
  AND assignment.id = schema.id
  AND schema.id = deployment.id
  AND version.deployment = deployment.deployment
  AND NOT deployment.failed
  AND network.name = schema.network
  AND assignment.node_id != 'removed'
ORDER BY
  blocks_behind_network DESC,
  subgraph_name;

SELECT
  subgraph.name || 
    CASE 
      WHEN subgraph.pending_version = version.id THEN ' (P)'
      WHEN subgraph.current_version = version.id THEN ' (C)'
      ELSE ' (Unknown)' 
    END AS subgraph_name,
  deployment.deployment,
  schema.id as schema_id,
  schema.created_at as created,
  shard as shard,
  active as active,
  REPLACE(assignment.node_id, '', '') AS node_id,
  deployment.synced::text AS is_synced,
  network.name AS network_name,
  (network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) AS blocks_behind_network,
  CASE 
    WHEN network.name = 'mainnet' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 5)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'rinkeby' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 4)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'kovan' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 15)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'poa-core' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'ropsten' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 2)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'arbitrum-one' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 230)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'arbitrum-sepolia' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 230)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'matic' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'base' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'optimism' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'avalanche' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'fantom' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 40)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'celo' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'gnosis' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'bsc' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 20)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'linea' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'scroll' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 20)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'boba' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'boba-bnb' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 5)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'moonbeam' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 10)::text
    ELSE 'N/A' 
  END AS lag
FROM
  subgraphs.subgraph_deployment AS deployment,
  subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment AS assignment,
  subgraphs.subgraph_version AS version,
  subgraphs.subgraph AS subgraph,
  ethereum_networks AS network,
  deployment_schemas AS schema
WHERE
  subgraph.id = version.subgraph
  AND version.id IN (subgraph.pending_version, subgraph.current_version)
  AND assignment.id = schema.id
  AND schema.id = deployment.id
  AND version.deployment = deployment.deployment
  AND NOT deployment.failed
  AND network.name = schema.network
  AND assignment.node_id not like 'index_node_%'
ORDER BY
  blocks_behind_network DESC,
  subgraph_name;

WITH ranked_errors AS (
    SELECT 
        subgraph_id, 
        vid, 
        encode(block_hash, 'hex') AS block_hash, 
        message, 
        handler, 
        deterministic, 
        created_at,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY subgraph_id ORDER BY vid DESC) AS rnk
    FROM subgraphs.subgraph_error
    WHERE deterministic = true
)
SELECT 
    subgraph_id, 
    vid, 
    block_hash, 
    message, 
    handler, 
    deterministic, 
    created_at
FROM ranked_errors
WHERE rnk = 1
ORDER BY vid DESC;

WITH ranked_errors AS (
    SELECT 
        subgraph_id, 
        vid, 
        encode(block_hash, 'hex') AS block_hash, 
        message, 
        handler, 
        deterministic, 
        created_at,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY subgraph_id ORDER BY vid DESC) AS rnk
    FROM subgraphs.subgraph_error
    WHERE deterministic = false
)
SELECT 
    subgraph_id, 
    vid, 
    block_hash, 
    message, 
    handler, 
    deterministic, 
    created_at
FROM ranked_errors
WHERE rnk = 1
ORDER BY vid DESC;

WITH ranked_errors AS (
    SELECT 
        subgraph_id, 
        vid, 
        encode(block_hash, 'hex') AS block_hash, 
        message, 
        handler, 
        deterministic, 
        created_at,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY subgraph_id ORDER BY vid DESC) AS rnk
    FROM subgraphs.subgraph_error
)
SELECT 
    subgraph_id, 
    vid, 
    block_hash, 
    message, 
    handler, 
    deterministic, 
    created_at
FROM ranked_errors
WHERE rnk = 1
ORDER BY vid DESC;

SELECT 
    ds.name as deployment_schema,
    ds.shard as deployment_shard,
    ds.created_at as deployment_created_at,
    sg.name as deployment_name,
    sd.deployment as deployment,
    substring(sm.repository, 20, 31) as git_repo,
    sda.node_id as node_id,
    sd.health as sub_health,
    sd.failed as sub_failed,
    sd.synced as sub_sync,
    sd.latest_ethereum_block_number as last_block,
    sd.entity_count as sub_entity,
    size.total_bytes as size_total, 
    size.total_bytes as size_total_bytes, 
    sm.start_block_number as start_block, 
    encode(sm.start_block_hash, 'hex') as start_hash, 
    encode(sd.latest_ethereum_block_hash, 'hex') as last_hash,
    sd.reorg_count as reorg_count, 
    sd.current_reorg_depth as curr_reorg_count, 
    sd.max_reorg_depth as max_reorg,
    ds.network as network,
    -- Removed subgraph_name, is_synced, and network_name
    (network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) AS blocks_behind_network,
    CASE 
        WHEN network.name = 'mainnet' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 5)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'rinkeby' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 4)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'kovan' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 15)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'poa-core' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'ropsten' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 2)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'arbitrum-one' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 230)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'arbitrum-sepolia' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 230)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'matic' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'base' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'optimism' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'avalanche' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'fantom' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 40)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'celo' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'gnosis' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'bsc' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 20)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'linea' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'scroll' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 20)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'boba' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'boba-bnb' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 5)::text
        WHEN network.name = 'moonbeam' THEN ((network.head_block_number - sd.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 10)::text
        ELSE 'N/A' 
    END AS lag
FROM subgraphs.subgraph_deployment AS sd
JOIN subgraphs.subgraph_manifest AS sm ON (sm.id = sd.id)
JOIN public.deployment_schemas AS ds ON (ds.subgraph = sd.deployment)
JOIN subgraphs.subgraph_version AS sv ON (sv.deployment = sd.deployment)
JOIN subgraphs.subgraph AS sg ON (sv.id IN (sg.current_version, sg.pending_version)) -- Added subgraph JOIN
LEFT JOIN subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment AS sda ON (sda.id = sd.id)
LEFT JOIN info.subgraph_sizes AS size ON (ds.name = size.name)
JOIN ethereum_networks AS network ON (network.name = ds.network)
ORDER BY sd.id;

select replace(node_id, '', '') as nodeId,
       count(*) as num_assigned,
       array_agg(id) as deployments
  from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment
 group by node_id
 order by node_id asc;

SELECT
  subgraph.name || 
    CASE 
      WHEN subgraph.pending_version = version.id THEN ' (P)'
      WHEN subgraph.current_version = version.id THEN ' (C)'
      ELSE ' (Unknown)' 
    END AS subgraph_name,
  deployment.deployment,
  schema.id as schema_id,
  schema.created_at as created,
  shard as shard,
  active as active,
  failed as failed,
  REPLACE(assignment.node_id, '', '') AS node_id,
  deployment.synced::text AS is_synced,
  network.name AS network_name,
  (network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) AS blocks_behind_network,
  CASE 
    WHEN network.name = 'mainnet' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 5)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'rinkeby' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 4)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'kovan' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 15)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'poa-core' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'ropsten' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 2)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'arbitrum-one' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 230)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'arbitrum-sepolia' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 230)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'matic' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'base' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'optimism' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'avalanche' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'fantom' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 40)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'celo' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'gnosis' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 12)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'bsc' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 20)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'linea' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'scroll' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 20)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'boba' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 30)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'boba-bnb' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 5)::text
    WHEN network.name = 'moonbeam' THEN ((network.head_block_number - deployment.latest_ethereum_block_number) / 10)::text
    ELSE 'N/A' 
  END AS lag
FROM
  subgraphs.subgraph_deployment AS deployment,
  subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment AS assignment,
  subgraphs.subgraph_version AS version,
  subgraphs.subgraph AS subgraph,
  ethereum_networks AS network,
  deployment_schemas AS schema
WHERE
  subgraph.id = version.subgraph
  AND version.id IN (subgraph.pending_version, subgraph.current_version)
  AND assignment.id = schema.id
  AND schema.id = deployment.id
  AND version.deployment = deployment.deployment
  AND network.name = schema.network
ORDER BY
  blocks_behind_network DESC,
  subgraph_name;
